# Streamlit Interface Status

## Current Status: ALPHA (Experimental)

The Streamlit web interface is currently in **ALPHA** stage.

### Quick Reference

| Aspect             | Status             |
| ------------------ | ------------------ |
| **Stability**      | ‚ö†Ô∏è Experimental    |
| **Production Use** | ‚ùå Not Recommended |
| **Testing/Demo**   | ‚úÖ Suitable        |
| **Version**        | 0.1.0-alpha        |
| **Last Updated**   | November 20, 2025  |

### Recommendations

- ‚úÖ **Production**: Use FastAPI backend (`app.py`)
- ‚ö†Ô∏è **Testing**: Use Streamlit GUI (`streamlit_app.py`)
- üìö **Documentation**: See [STREAMLIT_ALPHA_WARNING.md](../STREAMLIT_ALPHA_WARNING.md)

### What's Next

The Streamlit interface will graduate from ALPHA once:

- Comprehensive testing is completed
- Performance is optimized
- User feedback is incorporated
- Documentation is finalized

For more details, see [STREAMLIT_ALPHA_WARNING.md](../STREAMLIT_ALPHA_WARNING.md)
